page.title: 13OVER SIXTIES, WESTWOODSIDE
page.content: The{Over Sixties Club}is held every Wednesday at the Village Hall in Westwoodside from 2:00pm until 4:00pm. They play 12 games of dominoes and then have an interval for coffee, tea and biscuits. Then there are 12 more games of dominoes. The eldest member is 94. The youngest member is 62 years of age. All members have to pay an Annual Subscription of 50p. There are prizes for the winners of the dominoes and the raffles which they hold. The sort of booby prizes are soups, vegetables and fruits.The good prizes include some wines, cakes and buns. They have interesting trips.They go to the cinema, and Bridlington for day trips. The fondest memories are of Christmas when members all give presents and cards to each other.
